name: Almond Flour Peanut Butter Cookies
description: These peanut butter cookies are sugar free, gluten free, and keto - all while baking up soft and chewy and sweet!

author.name: Karly Campbell
author.description: Karly has been an active food blogger for over 10 years. She currently runs two blogs, sharing recipes and bits of life with her community of over 2 million readers each month.

publisher.name: That Low Carb Life
publisher.description: It's not a diet, it's a way of life.

recipeIngredient: 1 cup creamy no sugar added peanut butter
â…“ cup finely ground almond flour

recipeInstructions.name: Add the peanut butter, brown sugar, egg, and...
recipeInstructions.text: Add the peanut butter, brown sugar, egg, and vanilla to a mixing bowl and beat with an electric mixer until well combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the almond flour and baking soda and...
recipeInstructions.text: Add the almond flour and baking soda and mix well.

recipeInstructions.name: Use a medium cookie scoop to scoop out...
recipeInstructions.text: Use a medium cookie scoop to scoop out 18 balls of dough onto a parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.name: Use a fork to make a crisscross pattern...
recipeInstructions.text: Use a fork to make a crisscross pattern in each ball of dough.

recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 8-9 minutes or until the cookies...
recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 8-9 minutes or until the cookies are set on the edges. Do not overbake.

recipeInstructions.name: Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet...
recipeInstructions.text: Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet for 10 minutes before transferring to a cooling rack.
